website_summaries.verdict: A driver with all of the latest technologies will help you gain more distance off the tee with more accuracy.
pros: You'll receive more forgiveness for mishits with the redesigned club face
Available in 3 lofts and multiple flex shafts
Includes an aerodynamic design in the driver head to help you gain more speed at ball strike
cons: Expensive, but similar in price to other new drivers

customer_reviews.title: Top rated driver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great driver. I bought the Rogue X irons and love them and wanted to get the driver to go with them. I would recommend going to a club fitter first to match the shaft to your swing speed to get the best results. Then buy the driver and enjoy. I found that I am pretty consistently in the fairways with this club and a bit longer than with the Great Big Bertha driver I had before.
customer_reviews.author: JiminFla.

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. My opinion
customer_reviews.text: 3 guys I know bought exact same driver and have same issues. Very inconsistent and terrible feel. We all went back to our old drivers and got back in the groove. Even when I hit a good shot it felt dead. My older Callaway is livelier and longer. 10 hdcp. Just my 2 cents. With 3 other witnesses with same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bipfog2

customer_reviews.title: Delivers the distance and direction as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This driver does everything it is advertised to do. I am hitting my drives longer and straighter then I did with my old Callaway driver
customer_reviews.author: William Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Hitting 220-250 routinely
customer_reviews.text: Great club, love the Q shaft. Sounds oddly like a hickory club head—changed my game.
customer_reviews.author: Max M. Houck

customer_reviews.title: Find it elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: No head cover or adjustment tool includes. Makes no damn sense to sell a product with an adjustable head that doesn’t even come with the tool to adjust it. $13 for a head cover and $5 for the adjustment tool. Come on man.
customer_reviews.author: Tom McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great club!
customer_reviews.text: Love this driver. Amazing what a difference new technology can make. Hitting my drives 10 yards farther than my 6 year old Titleist driver.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Masterman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Driver!
customer_reviews.text: The club came in near perfect condition looks like it had never been used! Came with the head cover and tool for adjustments. Great driver I might change the grip but other than that it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ddorr

customer_reviews.title: Driver Head Cracked when received from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Pre-owned Driver just did not seem to get any distance. Thought it was me until I took it to PGA Superstore and they said the head was cracked. So much for quality control on pre-owned equipment. Callaway was very nice and replaced used Driver with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: rebootatrc

customer_reviews.title: Two Drivers Both Cracked First Use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this driver once as a gift for my brother. Upon first use the driver head made a popping sound and cracked in numerous places. We returned the first driver and ordered the same one, assuming the first was simply defective. The same thing happened to the second driver. We will not be ordering it from Amazon again, incredibly upset!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received the first club with deep chip in the top of the club head. Second club came with a deep gash from the top of the face extending back 1/4 inch on club head. Amazon has been quick and helpful. This review is 100% on quality of the club. Not sure if it was damaged in the warehouse or defect came from manufacturer. Almost seems like they got a batch of defected clubs they want to get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Tuohy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: 9* 50G shaft all set neutral. After reading all the reviews here and elsewhere, it's true. This is a great driver. It goes straight( all long as I don't get stupid) and I picked up 15-20 yards vs. my old driver.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Par 5's reachable in 2 strokes
customer_reviews.text: Added 100yds to my drive! I have mine set at a draw and -1. I actually drove a 352 green with 3 witnesses!! Great driver!! Lots of tuning options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice club, more nice of a price
customer_reviews.text: looks great, has only a few scuffs from being used but overall excellent condition, a lot lighter then the club i was using before, i’m happy with it
customer_reviews.author: gamer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome driver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome driver and looks brand new. The headcover is just simple and not the rogue that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Galliguez

customer_reviews.title: The cost of the Callaway Golf 2018 Men's Rogue Driver was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: The Callaway Golf 2018 Men's Rogue Driver, Left Hand, Synergy, 50G Shaft, Regular Flex, 10.5 degrees' met your expectations & was delivered sooner than we expected. He was very pleased with it and it has improved his golf game. Thank you for your service and help in our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NancyLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Very forgiving.
customer_reviews.text: Still pretty new to golf and this club is definitely forgiving. I should've gone with a stiff shaft, though, as the regular flex is pretty bendy. My mistake, but the club is great!
customer_reviews.author: KendallEmbry

customer_reviews.title: A driver for recreational golfers
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery.....pick up 20 to 30 yards.....nice game improvement driver for recreational players.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E.Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and received on time. Club looks good. If I can hit or not will be my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: Great driver with good distance, sound and is very forgiving
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great driver
customer_reviews.text: I had to go the driving range to get used to it. I now can hit it much further than my older driver and much higher trajectory . I have not adjusted the settings yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Great distance
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust to a slight draw, improved distance by 20 yds.
customer_reviews.author: G. J.

customer_reviews.title: it works great
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my husband per his request, he's very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: vikki

customer_reviews.title: very lightly used
customer_reviews.text: barely noticeable scuffs. who ever "used" it must have been a better golfer than me. HAHA!! very pleased with this used club purchase! will definitely do again.
customer_reviews.author: corey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with purchase. Club came well packed with tool for adjustment. The grip feels almost new. Will shop Callaway used equipment in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Best driver ever!
customer_reviews.text: The technology is phenomenal even for a "duffer" like me. Excellent feel when you hit the sweet spot. 20-30 extra yards with every drive and always in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy

customer_reviews.title: New driver
customer_reviews.text: Goes with my set and i cant wait to try it out. Shipped new w care and a cover. Came quicker than stated as well
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Practice!!
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting use to, not easy to switch drivers and expect to play better. Good feel though.
customer_reviews.author: Great Gift

customer_reviews.title: Best driver at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This driver is awesome. I haven’t had a new driver in years. I’m hitting the ball farther and straighter. No need to buy the higher priced drivers. Callaway driver delivers!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Should have included head cover and tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the driver!!! 20 to 30 yards on drives better than my diablo... was VERY disappointed that I did not get the head cover or tool... figured 500 bucks plus tax would have included that....
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an upgrade from my old Nike Dymo driver. I can hit it about 20 yards farther now. Love the feel of it and the sound as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Great club, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this driver, and having the ability to adjust it to your swing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love the Callaway rogue right out of the box 250 to 300 yards just going to get better from there
customer_reviews.text: Love the Callaway rogue right out of the box 250 to 300 yards just going to get better from there
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Walczak

customer_reviews.title: Love this Driver!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, adjustable loft - first day out I noticed a good 15-20 yards more distance than old driver. Callaway sure knows how to make drivers.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette G. Nations

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away on the great shape the driver is in. It’s like NEW and I’m in love. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Rogue driver
customer_reviews.text: My driver arrived before expected delivery date, packaged great and could be mistaken for a new driver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Club is in excellent condition and certificate of authentication arrived before the club did!
customer_reviews.text: Used inside so far and love it! Can't wait to get on the course with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Product was in perfect shape. Could not be happier with this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a Christmas gift for my Father in-law, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Herron

customer_reviews.title: 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Head broke off the driver the second time it was used
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Another great one.
customer_reviews.text: As always, Callaway produces a quality product that I can rely on. It performs as advertised and I will continue to be a customer loyal to the brand.
customer_reviews.author: T L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: This. This driver is study on the course. Even if you don't hit dead center every time, it has an amazing forgiveness to it, and will lengthen your game. The only drawback is the pri e, which for a new driver this quality is not a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Casey Mack

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf 2018 Rogue Driver
product_meta.description: Golf Digest 2018 Hot List Gold Medal Winner! The Rogue Driver delivers exceptional ball speed from the combination of our new Jailbreak Technology and X-Face VFT plus increased MOI for a breakthrough in driver performance.
feature_bullets: Exceptional Ball Speed from The Jailbreak Effect
More MOI and Forgiveness from Our Triaxial Carbon Crown
Premium Shaft Selection at Multiple Weights

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
